title: ASHRAE: Half and Half
description: Half and HalfThis notebook is the Python implementation of this awesomely simple R code: https://www.kaggle.com/kailex/ac-dc by kxx It demonstrates splitting the data in half and using each half to build a model which performs very well on the public LB with minimal feature engineering. The discussion on the same: https://www.kaggle.com/c/ashrae-energy-prediction/discussion/115851
